EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-11-09-Phoenix ESB-Tom Murphy Email.EM-2017-11-09-Phoenix-Tom Murphy
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited - IT Executive Dinner - November 14th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
I wanted to extend a final invitation to you for small private networking dinner <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-phoenix/]]> for IT executives in the greater Phoenix area. I will be hosting this event with Cisco next Tuesday, November 14th, at Mastro's City Hall Steakhouse. This will be a great opportunity to meet with peers, share challenges and discuss the hybrid cloud heading into the new year. I hope you can join us.
- Turbonomic Executive Networking Dinner - Phoenix <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-phoenix/]]>
- Tuesday, November 14 at 7:00 p.m.
- Mastro's City Hall Steakhouse
Our hosts:
- Tom Murphy <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/tomjmurphy/]]> (CMO Turbonomic)
- Judi Feeley <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/jfeeley/]]> (Regional Vice President - West)
Please sign up here <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-phoenix/]]> or let me know if you can make it. We would love to have you join the conversation.
Yours Sincerely,
Tom Murphy
Tom Murphy Chief Marketing Officer Turbonomic, Inc.
